prepare package¶

Submodules¶

prepare.classification module¶

class prepare.classification.PaddingInputExample[源代码]¶

基类：object

Fake example so the num input examples is a multiple of the batch size. When running eval/predict on the TPU, we need to pad the number of examples to be a multiple of the batch size, because the TPU requires a fixed batch size. The alternative is to drop the last batch, which is bad because it means the entire output data won't be generated. We use this class instead of None because treating None as padding battches could cause silent errors.

prepare.classification.convert_examples_to_features(tokenizer, examples, max_seq_length=256)[源代码]¶

Convert a set of InputExample`s to a list of `InputFeatures.

prepare.qa_match module¶

class prepare.qa_match.PaddingInputExample[源代码]¶

基类：object

Fake example so the num input examples is a multiple of the batch size. When running eval/predict on the TPU, we need to pad the number of examples to be a multiple of the batch size, because the TPU requires a fixed batch size. The alternative is to drop the last batch, which is bad because it means the entire output data won't be generated. We use this class instead of None because treating None as padding battches could cause silent errors.

class prepare.sequence_label.PaddingInputExample[源代码]¶

基类：object

Fake example so the num input examples is a multiple of the batch size. When running eval/predict on the TPU, we need to pad the number of examples to be a multiple of the batch size, because the TPU requires a fixed batch size. The alternative is to drop the last batch, which is bad because it means the entire output data won't be generated. We use this class instead of None because treating None as padding battches could cause silent errors.
